[M] Service ends early between 71 Av, Queens and Essex St, Manhattan

[F] [R] trains provide alternate service

[M] service operates between Essex St and Metropolitan Av.

Travel Alternatives:
[R] trains make all [M] stops between 71 Av and Queens Plaza.
[E] trains make all [M] stops between Queens Plaza and 5 Av/53 St until 9:45 PM.
[F] trains make all [M] stops between 47-50 Sts and Delancey St/Essex St until 9:45 PM.
After 9:45 PM, [E] trains are rerouted via the [F] between 21 St-Queensbridge and Lexington Av/63 St and via the [R] between 57 St-7 Av and Whitehall St.
Coney Island-bound [F] trains are rerouted via the [E] from Roosevelt Av to 50 St, then via the [A] express to Jay St-MetroTech.

After 10:30 PM, Jamaica-bound [F] trains are rerouted via the [E] after 47-50 Sts to Roosevelt Av.

• Transfer between [F] and [R] trains at Roosevelt Av or 34 St-Herald Sq.
• Transfer between [E] and [F] trains at W 4 St, until 9:45 PM
• Transfer between [F] and [J] [M] trains at Delancey St/Essex St, until 9:45 PM.
• Transfer between [N] [Q] [R] and [J] trains at Canal St, [F] after 9:45 PM.

Reminder: Late night [M] service operates between Metropolitan Av and Myrtle Av.
